title: Broncos-Cardinals, Dodgers, John Harbaugh, Lakers, Cowboys, & the Blazing 5
itunes:title: Broncos-Cardinals, Dodgers, John Harbaugh, Lakers, Cowboys, & the Blazing 5
description:
Colin discusses the Broncos-Cardinals game, why he is pulling for the Los Angeles Dodgers to make it to the World Series, why he still defends Michigan HC John Harbaugh, what to expect from the Los Angeles Lakers this season, why the Dallas Cowboys are about to fall, and his blazing 5 picks for the weekend. Guests include Stephen Jackson, Eric Dickerson, Shawne Merriman, Shams Charania, and Jason McIntyre.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
